comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: This uniform was that of a Swiss Oberleutnant (first lieutenant). I suppose he photo refers to an article "Triumph for Swiss Artillerists - All European military records for carrying artillery to the greatest height in the mountains have just been beaten by a company of Swiss officers and men from Fort Savatan under the command of Captain Hans Wirth and Lieutenants Gupper, Perrenoud and Frick ...." see Dakota County herald., October 25, 1912, Image 2, last column
